content: Claim submitted for Lincoln Kaur (ID# PA-4892-LK) for experimental CAR-T cell therapy at Hemisphere Oncology. Treatment dates: 10/15/2023-11/03/2023. Attending physician: Dr. Elise Varga. Patient presents with refractory mantle cell lymphoma. Previous denials for this treatment were overturned after peer-to-peer review. Home health services coordinated through Brightview Care at 675 Magnolia Blvd., Suite 210.
